archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Radiology Information System (RIS)
• Purpose: Radiology department workflow and information management
• Core Functions:
o Imaging order management and scheduling o Patient preparation and workflow tracking o Radiologist reporting and dictation o Image distribution and communication o Department resource management
• Integration: PACS for image management, EHR for orders and results, billing systems • Standards: HL7 for orders and results, DICOM for image metadata • Workflow: Exam scheduling, patient tracking, reporting workflows, quality assurance • Benefits: Streamlined radiology operations, improved reporting efficiency, better patient care
